parameters.content:
## Influencer Campaign Setup

‚öôÔ∏è **Configure campaign parameters:**
- Target audience demographics
- Budget allocation per platform
- Content requirements
- Timeline and deliverables

parameters.message:
=

ü§ù Partnership Opportunity

We'd love to collaborate with you!

Hi {{ $json.username }},

We've been following your {{ $json.platform }} content and are impressed by your authentic engagement with your audience. We'd love to partner with you for our {{ $node['Campaign Settings'].json.campaignName }} campaign!

üìä Why We Chose You

Engagement Rate: {{ $json.engagement_rate }}%

Followers: {{ $json.follower_count.toLocaleString() }}

Platform: {{ $json.platform.toUpperCase() }}

Match Score: {{ $json.score }}/100

üéØ Campaign Details

Campaign: {{ $node['Campaign Settings'].json.campaignName }}

Duration: {{ new Date($json.campaign_start).toLocaleDateString() }} - {{ new Date($json.campaign_end).toLocaleDateString() }}

Target Audience: {{ $node['Campaign Settings'].json.targetAudience }}

üìù What We're Looking For

    {{#each $json.deliverables}}
  • {{ this }}
    • {{/each}}

All content subject to approval, but we trust your creative vision!

üí∞ Compensation

Payment: ${{ $json.estimated_cost }} per campaign

Cost per engagement: ${{ $json.cost_per_engagement }}

Payment processed within 7 days of content delivery

üíå I'm Interested!

We're excited about the possibility of working together and would love to hear your thoughts!

Best regards,
{{ $node['Campaign Settings'].json.campaignName }} Team
{{ $node['Campaign Settings'].json.brandEmail }}
parameters.subject: ={{ $json.outreach_subject }}

parameters.message:
=

üëã Quick Follow-up

Just checking in about our partnership opportunity

Hi {{ $json.username }},

I wanted to follow up on the collaboration opportunity I sent a few days ago. I know you probably get a lot of partnership requests, but I genuinely think this could be a great fit for your audience.

üìã Quick Recap

Campaign: {{ $node['Campaign Settings'].json.campaignName }}

Compensation: ${{ $json.estimated_cost }}

Timeline: 2 weeks

Deliverables: {{ $json.deliverables.join(', ') }}

Would you be interested in a quick 15-minute call to discuss this further? I'm flexible with timing and would love to answer any questions you might have.

üìû Let's Chat

Thanks for considering, and I look forward to hearing from you!

Best,
{{ $node['Campaign Settings'].json.campaignName }} Team
parameters.subject: Following up on our collaboration opportunity

parameters.content:
